subject: FW: [JUnit] unit testing - EJB - RemoteException and NoClassDefFoundError
messageBody:
> hello all.
> i am trying to unit test my entity bean after deploying it on weblogic
> 5.1 server. the test bombs when i execute "home.create( )". for some
> reason the junit client is unable to talk to the server. anyone know
> what the problem may be? here is the output message from JUnit.
>
> -----------------
> There was 1 failure:
> 1) testCreate(test.com.gensys.framework.ejb.GsUserSessionTest) ";
> nested excepti
> on is:
> weblogic.rmi.ServerError: A RemoteException occurred in the
> server metho
> d
> - with nested exception:
> [java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Ljavax/ejb/Handle;]"
>
> FAILURES!!!
> Tests run: 1, Failures: 1, Errors: 0
> ----------------------
>
>
> Michael Choe
> GenSys Software
> 2434 Main Street, 2nd Floor
> Santa Monica, CA 90405
> (310) 309-6700
>
